newsitem.title: GREECE: CITIBANK, ATHENS CUTS WORKING CAPITAL LOAN RATES.
newsitem.headline: CITIBANK, ATHENS CUTS WORKING CAPITAL LOAN RATES.

text.p: Citibank will keep cut its base lending rates for working capital, freely investible funds and personal installment loans effective on Tuesday, it said.
Citibank, which reviews its rates weekly, offers the
** Base rate for working capital loans at 15.0 from 16.25 percent
** Business and professional base lending rate at 16.25 from 17.00 percent
** Base rate for freely investible funds at 15,25 from 16.50 percent
** Personal installment loans steady at 22 percent
** Personal installment loans with invoices at 17.0 from 20 percent
** Auto loans through representative at 18.75 percent
Contribution under Law 128 is not included in the rates
